message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair considering the rate of inflation we're facing.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. This is more balanced, and we both lose less to inflation if we agree now.
Bob, we're losing money quickly. My last offer was fair, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more to get this done.  This is my final offer.
Alice, this is a critical point.  Your offer was too low.  I'm compromising further to end this, but I can't go lower. We both need to agree now.
